metadata.Title: CVE-2023-5824 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: Squid is vulnerable to Denial of Service attack against HTTP and HTTPS clients due to an Improper Handling of Structural Elements bug.

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Joshua Rogers of Opera Software and by The Measurement Factory

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-11-13, this is not fixed in the upstream 5.x repository. The patches to fix this issue are large and intrusive. Per the researcher's advisory, "Of course, such 'attacks' are completely theoretical and are only considered for entertainment purposes." This CVE will be marked as deferred until a backport to 5.x is available.

criterions.comment: squid package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-11-13').
